ingredients.ingredient: ½ pound sliced bacon, cut into thirds
1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks in juice, drained

cookingTips: Drain pineapple chunks well to prevent soggy bacon
Mix brown sugar, mayo, and chili sauce together as a glaze before or after baking
Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes, stirring halfway through for even cooking
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the sweet and savory flavor profile and when to apply the glaze for best results.
